description: Base terrain feature definitions for encounter balance and hazards. Features modify creature effectiveness and can include environmental hazards.

features.name: Dichte Dornen
features.description: Thick thorn bushes that damage and slow creatures without flight or climb.

features.name: Schnappende Ranken
features.description: Animated vines that attempt to restrain creatures entering the area.

features.name: Magische Dunkelheit
features.description: Supernatural darkness that impairs normal vision but benefits creatures with darkvision.

features.name: Dichter Nebel
features.description: Thick fog that heavily obscures the area, favoring creatures with blindsight.

features.name: Glatteis
features.description: Slippery ice that causes walking creatures to fall prone and favors flyers.

features.name: Tiefes Wasser
features.description: Waist-deep water that heavily impairs non-swimming creatures.

features.name: Versteckte Gruben
features.description: Concealed pit traps that drop creatures into holes, useless against flyers.

features.name: Loser Schutt
features.description: Unstable rocky ground that creates noise and slows movement.

features.name: Brennender Boden
features.description: Ground covered in flames that burns creatures standing in it each round.

features.name: Giftsporen
features.description: Clouds of toxic fungal spores that poison creatures breathing them.
